Lems.description: A number of ComponentTypes for providing spiking and current inputs to other ComponentTypes

ComponentType.name: basePointCurrent
ComponentType.description: Base type for all ComponentTypes which produce a current _i (with dimension current)

Exposure.name: i
Exposure.description: The total (usually time varying) current produced by this ComponentType

ComponentType.name: baseVoltageDepPointCurrent
ComponentType.description: Base type for all ComponentTypes which produce a current _i (with dimension current) and require a voltage _v exposed on the parent Component, which would often be the membrane potential of a Component extending _baseCellMembPot_

Requirement.name: v
Requirement.description: The current may vary with the voltage exposed by the ComponentType on which this is placed

ComponentType.name: baseVoltageDepPointCurrentSpiking
ComponentType.description: Base type for all ComponentTypes which produce a current _i, require a membrane potential _v exposed on the parent and emit spikes (on a port _spike). The exposed variable _tsince can be used for plotting the time since the Component has spiked last

EventPort.name: spike
EventPort.description: Port on which spikes are emitted

Exposure.name: tsince
Exposure.description: Time since the last spike was emitted

ComponentType.name: basePointCurrentDL
ComponentType.description: Base type for all ComponentTypes which produce a dimensionless current _I. There are many dimensionless equivalents of all the core current producing ComponentTypes such as _pulseGenerator_ / _pulseGeneratorDL_, _sineGenerator_ / _sineGeneratorDL_ and _rampGenerator_ / _rampGeneratorDL_

Exposure.name: I
Exposure.description: The total (time varying) current produced by this ComponentType

ComponentType.name: baseVoltageDepPointCurrentDL
ComponentType.description: Base type for all ComponentTypes which produce a dimensionless current _I and require a dimensionless membrane potential _V exposed on the parent Component

Requirement.name: V
Requirement.description: The current may vary with the dimensionless voltage exposed by the ComponentType on which this is placed

ComponentType.name: baseSpikeSource
ComponentType.description: Base for any ComponentType whose main purpose is to emit spikes (on a port _spike). The exposed variable _tsince can be used for plotting the time since the Component has spiked last.

EventPort.name: spike
EventPort.description: Port on which spikes are emitted

Exposure.name: tsince
Exposure.description: Time since the last spike was emitted

ComponentType.name: spikeGenerator
ComponentType.description: Simple generator of spikes at a regular interval set by _period

Parameter.name: period
Parameter.description: Time between spikes. The first spike will be emitted after this time.

Constant.name: SMALL_TIME
Constant.description: A useful constant for use as a non zero time increment

Exposure.name: tnext
Exposure.description: When the next spike should ideally be emitted (dt permitting)

ComponentType.name: spikeGeneratorRandom
ComponentType.description: Generator of spikes with a random interspike interval of at least _minISI and at most _maxISI

Parameter.name: maxISI
Parameter.description: Maximum interspike interval

Parameter.name: minISI
Parameter.description: Minimum interspike interval

Constant.name: MSEC
Constant.description: Required for converting time values to/from dimensionless quantities

Exposure.name: isi
Exposure.description: The interval until the next spike

Exposure.name: tnext
Exposure.description: When the next spike should ideally be emitted (dt permitting)

ComponentType.name: spikeGeneratorPoisson
ComponentType.description: Generator of spikes whose ISI is distributed according to an exponential PDF with scale: 1 / _averageRate

Parameter.name: averageRate
Parameter.description: The average rate at which spikes are emitted

Exposure.name: isi
Exposure.description: The interval until the next spike

Exposure.name: tnextIdeal
Exposure.description: This is the ideal/perfect next spike time, based on a newly generated isi, but dt precision will mean that it's usually slightly later than this

Exposure.name: tnextUsed
Exposure.description: This is the next spike time for practical purposes, ensuring that it's later than the current time

ComponentType.name: spikeGeneratorRefPoisson
ComponentType.description: Generator of spikes whose ISI distribution is the maximum entropy distribution over [ _minimumISI, +infinity ) with mean: 1 / _averageRate

Parameter.name: minimumISI
Parameter.description: The minimum interspike interval

ComponentType.name: poissonFiringSynapse
ComponentType.description: Poisson spike generator firing at _averageRate, which is connected to single _synapse that is triggered every time a spike is generated, producing an input current. See also _transientPoissonFiringSynapse_.

Parameter.name: averageRate
Parameter.description: The average rate at which spikes are emitted

EventPort.name: spike
EventPort.description: Port on which spikes are emitted

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: Note this is not used here. Will be removed in future

Exposure.name: tsince
Exposure.description: Time since the last spike was emitted

Exposure.name: isi
Exposure.description: The interval until the next spike

Path.name: spikeTarget
Path.description: The target of the spikes, i.e. the synapse

ComponentType.name: transientPoissonFiringSynapse
ComponentType.description: Poisson spike generator firing at _averageRate after a _delay and for a _duration, connected to single _synapse that is triggered every time a spike is generated, providing an input current. Similar to ComponentType _poissonFiringSynapse_.

EventPort.name: spike
EventPort.description: Port on which spikes are emitted

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: Note this is not used here. Will be removed in future

Exposure.name: tsince
Exposure.description: Time since the last spike was emitted

ComponentType.name: timedSynapticInput
ComponentType.description: Spike array connected to a single _synapse, producing a current triggered by each _spike_ in the array.

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: This will receive events from the children

Exposure.name: tsince
Exposure.description: Time since the last spike was emitted

ComponentType.name: spikeArray
ComponentType.description: Set of spike ComponentTypes, each emitting one spike at a certain time. Can be used to feed a predetermined spike train into a cell

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: This will receive events from the children

ComponentType.name: spike
ComponentType.description: Emits a single spike at the specified _time

Parameter.name: time
Parameter.description: Time at which to emit one spike event

Exposure.name: spiked
Exposure.description: 0 signals not yet spiked, 1 signals has spiked

ComponentType.name: pulseGenerator
ComponentType.description: Generates a constant current pulse of a certain _amplitude for a specified _duration after a _delay. Scaled by _weight, if set

Parameter.name: delay
Parameter.description: Delay before change in current. Current is zero prior to this.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration for holding current at amplitude. Current is zero after delay + duration.

Parameter.name: amplitude
Parameter.description: Amplitude of current pulse

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: Note: this is not used here. Will be removed in future

ComponentType.name: compoundInput
ComponentType.description: Generates a current which is the sum of all its child _basePointCurrent_ element, e.g. can be a combination of _pulseGenerator_, _sineGenerator_ elements producing a single _i. Scaled by _weight, if set

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: Note this is not used here. Will be removed in future

ComponentType.name: compoundInputDL
ComponentType.description: Generates a current which is the sum of all its child _basePointCurrentDL_ elements, e.g. can be a combination of _pulseGeneratorDL_, _sineGeneratorDL_ elements producing a single _i. Scaled by _weight, if set

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: Note this is not used here. Will be removed in future

ComponentType.name: pulseGeneratorDL
ComponentType.description: Dimensionless equivalent of _pulseGenerator_. Generates a constant current pulse of a certain _amplitude for a specified _duration after a _delay. Scaled by _weight, if set

Parameter.name: delay
Parameter.description: Delay before change in current. Current is zero prior to this.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration for holding current at amplitude. Current is zero after delay + duration.

Parameter.name: amplitude
Parameter.description: Amplitude of current pulse

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: Note this is not used here. Will be removed in future

ComponentType.name: sineGenerator
ComponentType.description: Generates a sinusoidally varying current after a time _delay, for a fixed _duration. The _period and maximum _amplitude of the current can be set as well as the _phase at which to start. Scaled by _weight, if set

Parameter.name: phase
Parameter.description: Phase (between 0 and 2*pi) at which to start the varying current (i.e. at time given by delay)

Parameter.name: delay
Parameter.description: Delay before change in current. Current is zero prior to this.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration for holding current at amplitude. Current is zero after delay + duration.

Parameter.name: amplitude
Parameter.description: Maximum amplitude of current

Parameter.name: period
Parameter.description: Time period of oscillation

ComponentType.name: sineGeneratorDL
ComponentType.description: Dimensionless equivalent of _sineGenerator_. Generates a sinusoidally varying current after a time _delay, for a fixed _duration. The _period and maximum _amplitude of the current can be set as well as the _phase at which to start. Scaled by _weight, if set

Parameter.name: phase
Parameter.description: Phase (between 0 and 2*pi) at which to start the varying current (i.e. at time given by delay)

Parameter.name: delay
Parameter.description: Delay before change in current. Current is zero prior to this.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration for holding current at amplitude. Current is zero after delay + duration.

Parameter.name: amplitude
Parameter.description: Maximum amplitude of current

Parameter.name: period
Parameter.description: Time period of oscillation

ComponentType.name: rampGenerator
ComponentType.description: Generates a ramping current after a time _delay, for a fixed _duration. During this time the current steadily changes from _startAmplitude to _finishAmplitude. Scaled by _weight, if set

Parameter.name: delay
Parameter.description: Delay before change in current. Current is baselineAmplitude prior to this.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration for holding current at amplitude. Current is baselineAmplitude after delay + duration.

Parameter.name: startAmplitude
Parameter.description: Amplitude of linearly varying current at time delay

Parameter.name: finishAmplitude
Parameter.description: Amplitude of linearly varying current at time delay + duration

Parameter.name: baselineAmplitude
Parameter.description: Amplitude of current before time delay, and after time delay + duration

ComponentType.name: rampGeneratorDL
ComponentType.description: Dimensionless equivalent of _rampGenerator_. Generates a ramping current after a time _delay, for a fixed _duration. During this time the dimensionless current steadily changes from _startAmplitude to _finishAmplitude. Scaled by _weight, if set

Parameter.name: delay
Parameter.description: Delay before change in current. Current is baselineAmplitude prior to this.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration for holding current at amplitude. Current is baselineAmplitude after delay + duration.

Parameter.name: startAmplitude
Parameter.description: Amplitude of linearly varying current at time delay

Parameter.name: finishAmplitude
Parameter.description: Amplitude of linearly varying current at time delay + duration

Parameter.name: baselineAmplitude
Parameter.description: Amplitude of current before time delay, and after time delay + duration

ComponentType.name: voltageClamp
ComponentType.description: Voltage clamp. Applies a variable current _i to try to keep parent at _targetVoltage. Not yet fully tested!!! Consider using voltageClampTriple!!

Parameter.name: delay
Parameter.description: Delay before change in current. Current is zero prior to this.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration for attempting to keep parent at targetVoltage. Current is zero after delay + duration.

Parameter.name: targetVoltage
Parameter.description: Current will be applied to try to get parent to this target voltage

Parameter.name: simpleSeriesResistance
Parameter.description: Current will be calculated by the difference in voltage between the target and parent, divided by this value

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: Note this is not used here. Will be removed in future

ComponentType.name: voltageClampTriple
ComponentType.description: Voltage clamp with 3 clamp levels. Applies a variable current _i (through _simpleSeriesResistance) to try to keep parent cell at _conditioningVoltage until time _delay, _testingVoltage until _delay + _duration, and _returnVoltage afterwards. Only enabled if _active = 1.

Parameter.name: active
Parameter.description: Whether the voltage clamp is active (1) or inactive (0).

Parameter.name: delay
Parameter.description: Delay before switching from conditioningVoltage to testingVoltage.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration to hold at testingVoltage.

Parameter.name: conditioningVoltage
Parameter.description: Target voltage before time delay

Parameter.name: testingVoltage
Parameter.description: Target voltage between times delay and delay + duration

Parameter.name: returnVoltage
Parameter.description: Target voltage after time duration

Parameter.name: simpleSeriesResistance
Parameter.description: Current will be calculated by the difference in voltage between the target and parent, divided by this value

EventPort.name: in
EventPort.description: Note this is not used here. Will be removed in future
